text: Alen Hodžić (born August 8, 1992 in Koper, Slovenia) is a Slovenian professional basketball player for Sixt Primorska of the Slovenian League. He is a 1.91 m tall Shooting guard. ==Professional career== Kosi started playing professional basketball for Luka Koper. In May 2017, Hodžić signed with Sixt Primorska.Alen Hodžić spet v Kopru On May 29, 2020, he signed a two-year deal with Cedevita Olimpija. Alen Hodžić tudi uradno novi član Olimpije ==References== ==External links== * Eurobasket.com profile * ABA 2 profile * REALGM profile Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Slovenian men's basketball players Category:Guards (basketball) Category:People from Koper
